ygData.subject: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know how this old email got resent to the list (check the date) - thanks for all the new advice, but since this email I have gotten a combine
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know how this old email got resent to the list (check the date) -
thanks for all the new advice, but since this email I have gotten a combine
long-sword and a FS long-sword (same damage and delay, but the combine is a
necessary tool for killing magic creatures).

>----------> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
>Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 5:34 AM
>To: warriors_eq@onelist.com> Subject: [warriors_eq] Hail
>
>From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>>> Hail Warriors,
>
> I am a 6'6" Barbarian Warrior Princess of the 11th circle currently
>wandering Clan Crushbone in an effort to rid the world of Orcs. I am
>looking for better armor or weapons. I am wearing all leather (and it
>feels good) and using a tarnished longsword with a shield. Looking forward
>to
>the day I am weilding two longswords and I can kill orcs quicker.
>
>For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
>
>Patty of Halas
>username: Patricia
>server: Bristlebane
